page.title: 06DINNINGTON
page.content: On March Terrace is situated a small{Methodist Chapel,}built in 1866. Further along March Terrace is the White Swan public house, a fairly modern looking building compared to most others on the terrace.Opening hours are standard pub opening times 11.30am-3.00pm and 5.30pm-11.00pm.Just off Front Street } are two further pubs,The Masons Arms is a large modern looking building, opening the usual{pub times. Facilities include outside tables and chairs and a small car park. On Front Street,a village hall is available for various functions. Opening hours depend on the event which is taking place. Along Cochrane Terrace a small house has been converted in a{police house.} The service is used frequently.
